ygData.subject: Re: Is there anyone out there still on this list?  No bugs   here
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, The only one I can think of is the Tentacle Whip.  It has a damage rating of 4 and a speed of about 28.  Plus it occasionally casts Lifetap.  I
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,

The only one I can think of is the Tentacle Whip. It has a damage rating of 4 and a speed of about 28. Plus it occasionally casts Lifetap. I bought one from someone for 20pp. I have heard comments from many people, some say it is a good price, others disagree. Personally I find it to be a cool looking but not very effective weapon, especially compared with the mino axe or dwarven 1H axe.

Silverius, Lv11 High Elf Paladin, The Rathe

>Thanks for the info, maybe what I want does not exist - a magical one-handed
slashing weapon for around 10-25 platinum? I usually group with a 14th level
Magician, and even though I appreciate the summoned fang he gives me, the puny
1-6hp dmg I do with it and the fact that it's a piercing weapon makes me feel
somewhat useless when we are hunting wisps.

Kaladin
